dcterms:creator: R. D. Brandt
F. Lin
dcterms:description: A learning algorithm for neural networks that does not require feedback, allowing for simpler implementations and biological plausibility.
dcterms:title: Brandt-Lin Learning Algorithm

dcterms:creator: F. Lin
R. D. Brandt
G. Saikalis
dcterms:description: A method for self-tuning PID controllers using adaptive interaction, enhancing control performance.
dcterms:title: Self-tuning of PID Controllers

dcterms:creator: R. D. Brandt
F. Lin
dcterms:description: Explores adaptive interaction and its applications in neural networks, providing insights into learning mechanisms.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Interaction and Its Application to Neural Networks

dcterms:creator: F. Lin
dcterms:description: Discusses supervised learning in neural networks with a focus on feedback-network-free implementations and biological plausibility.
dcterms:title: Supervised Learning in Neural Networks

dcterms:creator: K. J. Åström
B. Wittenmark
dcterms:description: A comprehensive resource on adaptive control, covering algorithms, analysis, and applications.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Control

dcterms:creator: I. D. Landau
R. Lozano
M. M’Saad
A. Karimi
dcterms:description: A detailed examination of adaptive control algorithms, their analysis, and practical applications.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Control: Algorithms, Analysis and Applications

dcterms:creator: G. Tao
dcterms:description: A resource focusing on the design and analysis of adaptive control systems.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Control Design and Analysis

dcterms:creator: S. N. Singh
M. Steinberg
dcterms:description: Discusses adaptive control strategies for feedback linearizable nonlinear systems, particularly in flight control applications.
dcterms:title: Adaptive Control of Feedback Linearizable Nonlinear Systems

dcterms:creator: W. Wang
J. Huang
C. Wen
H. Fan
dcterms:description: Explores distributed adaptive control strategies for consensus tracking, with applications in formation control of non-holonomic mobile robots.
dcterms:title: Distributed Adaptive Control for Consensus Tracking

dcterms:creator: W. Sun
Y. Zhang
Y. Huang
H. Gao
O. Kaynak
dcterms:description: Presents robust adaptive control strategies that guarantee transient performance, particularly for precision motion control systems.
dcterms:title: Transient-Performance-Guaranteed Robust Adaptive Control

dcterms:creator: K. J. Åström
dcterms:description: A survey of the theory and applications of adaptive control, summarizing key concepts and developments in the field.
dcterms:title: Theory and Applications of Adaptive Control

dcterms:creator: G. C. Goodwin
D. Q. Mayne
dcterms:description: Explores parameter estimation in the context of continuous time model reference adaptive control.
dcterms:title: Parameter Estimation Perspective of Continuous Time Model Reference Adaptive Control

dcterms:creator: G. Kreisselmeier
K. Narendra
dcterms:description: Discusses stable model reference adaptive control in the presence of bounded disturbances, providing insights into robustness.
dcterms:title: Stable Model Reference Adaptive Control in the Presence of Bounded Disturbances

dcterms:creator: X. Yu
Z. Man
dcterms:description: Explores model reference adaptive control systems that utilize terminal sliding modes for improved performance.
dcterms:title: Model Reference Adaptive Control Systems with Terminal Sliding Modes

dcterms:creator: D. Zhang
B. Wei
dcterms:description: A review of model reference adaptive control techniques specifically applied to robotic manipulators.
dcterms:title: A Review on Model Reference Adaptive Control of Robotic Manipulators

dcterms:creator: M. I. Mosaad
dcterms:description: Discusses model reference adaptive control of STATCOM for integrating wind energy systems into the grid.
dcterms:title: Model Reference Adaptive Control of STATCOM for Grid Integration of Wind Energy Systems
